title: VoiceMo
description:
Eager to chat to your friends, but texting is not an option at that time, or is not helping you showcase the right emotion? VoiceMo is a FREE, fast and simple voice messaging app available for iOS that is focused only on voice, but with all the popular features of a chat app.

On VoiceMo you can send self-destructing voice messages, create a group chat and so much more!
